rules_text:
When Virnut enters the battlefield, create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with haste. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever a creature token you control leaves the battlefield, put a rift counter on Virnut.
When there are ten or more rift counters on Virnut, sacrifice it. If you do, it deals 30 damage to any target.
